<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ghost Hunter](/Feats.aspx?ID=1368) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 38 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to the [Boneyard](/Planes.aspx?ID=15) ensures that your blows strike true against spectral beings. Your weapon and unarmed attack Strikes against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures become [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103). If they are already magical, they instead gain the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune.
